title: Ranked - Silver II
body:
Silver 2. 
One month, 8 days until the end of season.
How do I climb to Gold 5. 
Tips and advice pls

replies.body: Lmao in the exact same position, S2 with 60lp. Goodluck

If your win rate is 50% or above, just play ranked non-stop and you should climb, because apparently it is structured that even if you have a 50% win rate you will still climb. Or if you know someone with a team in gold ask to join their team and play the necessary number games required to receive end of season rewards. 
(bribe them with a skin or two if they are hesitant) but S2 is close enough to gold that you wont be out of your depth.

im not gold btw this is just theoretical.
My win rate is 51.7% even though I came off a 5 game losing tilt

well if you just binge play ranked it should work out for you. 

but this is coming from someone who hasn't managed to get to gold himself
